title: Yeah The Boys - Short Film
html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/1019210228?app_id=122963" width="426" height="240" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture; clipboard-write" title="Yeah The Boys - Short Film"></iframe>
description:
Yeah the Boys follows six young Australian men as they sink beers over an afternoon and well into the night. Emoting only through movement; lewd gestures, chokeholds, crowd surfs, and chugging shoeys, they somehow say everything without uttering a single word.
Equal parts larrikin, brutal, and tender, this choreographic short film scored by The Avalanches is an observation of Australian masculine identity and our nation's relationship with drinking culture.

*WINNER 'Best Australian Short Film' - Flickerfest International Film Festival 2024*
*WINNER 'Innovation Award' - St Kilda Film Festival 2024
*WINNER 'Best Original Score' - St Kilda Film Festival 2024
*NOMINATED 'Best International Short Film' - Palm Springs ShortFest 2024
*NOMINATED ‘Best Special Video Project - UKMVA 2024
*NOMINATED ‘Best Dance Film’ - Bolton Film Festival 2024
